title: Trailblazer League/Guide/Magic

properties.name: description
properties.value: Players only have access to the normal spellbook by default and must unlock the Fremennik Region to access the Lunar Spellbook or the Desert Region to access the Ancient Spellbook. These spellbooks are automatically unlocked in full upon unlocking their respective region, players must still visit the Astral Altar or the altar inside the Jaldraocht Pyramid to swap from the normal spellbook. The Arceuus Spellbook is disabled in the Trailblazer League.

content:
Trailblazer League
Guides

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Obtaining runes
  • 3 Restrictions
  • 4 Temporary boosts
    • 4.1 Skillcape
  • 5 Quests
    • 5.1 XP rewards with skill choice

Overview[edit | edit source]

Players only have access to the normal spellbook by default and must unlock the Fremennik Region to access the Lunar Spellbook or the Desert Region to access the Ancient Spellbook. These spellbooks are automatically unlocked in full upon unlocking their respective region, players must still visit the Astral Altar or the altar inside the Jaldraocht Pyramid to swap from the normal spellbook. The Arceuus Spellbook is disabled in the Trailblazer League.

Certain teleports are disabled due to area restrictions.

Magic as a combat skill is expected to be heavily influenced by Tier 3 and Tier 6 Relics.

Obtaining runes[edit | edit source]

Morytania is the only region without a Rune shop. Players will be unable to purchase Soul runes without unlocking either the Fremennik Region or Desert Region, or both the Asgarnia Region and Kandarin Region. If a player chooses to unlock any combination of Asgarnia, Kandarin, Fremennik and Morytania only, they will be unable to purchase Cosmic runes from shops.

Region Shop
Misthalin✓ Aubury's Rune Shop 430 3 330 9950 180 N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A
Karamja✓ TzHaar-Mej-Roh's Rune Store[1] 645 4 4 ea 135 ea 270 N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A
Desert✓ Ali's Discount Wares.[2] 5 ea 3 412 12437 225 500 62 225 300 375 N/A
Wilderness✓ Battle Runes 430 N/A 330 9950 180 400 N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A
Wilderness✓ Lundail's Arena-side Rune Shop 430 3 330 9950 180 N/A 50 180 240 N/A N/A
Asgarnia✓ Betty's Magic Emporium 430 3 330 9950 180 N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A
Asgarnia✓ Void Knight Magic Store 430 3 330 9950 180 N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A
Asgarnia✓
Kandarin✓		 Magic Guild Store[3] 430 3 330 9950 180 400 N/A 180 240 300 N/A
Kandarin✓ Tutab's Magical Market 430 N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A N/A 240 N/A N/A
Fremennik✓ Baba Yaga's Magic Shop[4] 430 3 330 9950 180 400 N/A 180 240 300 50
Tirannwn✓ Amlodd's Magical Supplies[4] 430 3 330 9950 180 400 50 180 240 N/A N/A
  1. ^ Prices reduced while wearing Karamja gloves 1 or better.
  2. ^ Requires completion of the Rogue Trader miniquest to access shop. No additional region requirements.
  3. ^ Requires 66 Magic and completion of The Hand in the Sand quest, which requires Asgarnia and Kandarin unlocked.
  4. ^ 4.0 4.1 When purchasing runes, prices become more expensive more quickly than at other shops.

Restrictions[edit | edit source]

The Lunar spellbook will only be accessible after unlocking the Fremennik region.

The Ancient spellbook will only be accessible after unlocking the Desert region. Additionally, to swap spellbooks quickly a player will either need the Fremennik region unlocked to build an Ancient altar in their Player-owned house, or the Kandarin region unlocked to purchase the Magic cape at 99 Magic, or to obtain a Pharaoh's sceptre from Pyramid Plunder.

Icon Spell Magic Level Runes Region Description
Camelot Teleport 45 5 1 Kandarin✓ Teleports player to Camelot, useful for training magic.
Iban Blast 50 5 1 Tirannwn✓ Unless a player unlocks the Kandarin region as well, they will have to recharge their Iban's Staff every 120 casts.
Magic Dart 50 1 4 Misthalin✓ Max hit substantially increased by unlocking the Wilderness Region and obtaining a Slayer's staff (e).
Ardougne Teleport 51 2 2 Kandarin✓ Requires completion of Plague City, which can be manually completed in the Kandarin Region or auto-unlocked in the Tirannwn Region or Fremennik Region.
Charge Water Orb 56 30 3 1 Asgarnia✓
Kandarin✓		 Requires the Asgarnia Region to access the Taverley Dungeon, and the Kandarin Region to climb the ladder to the Water obelisk.
Watchtower Teleport 58 2 2 Kandarin✓ The Watchtower quest is auto-unlocked in the Kandarin Region, so this spell is immediately accessible.
Charge Earth Orb 60 30 3 1 Wilderness✓ The Earth obelisk cannot be reached without unlocking the Wilderness Region to access the Edgeville dungeon.
Bones to Peaches 60 2 4 2 Desert✓ Requires manual unlock in the Mage training arena.
Saradomin Strike 60 4 2 2 Wilderness✓ Requires manual unlock of the Mage arena miniquest.
Claws of Guthix 60 4 1 2 Wilderness✓ Requires manual unlock of the Mage arena miniquest.
Flames of Zamorak 60 1 4 2 Wilderness✓ Requires manual unlock of the Mage arena miniquest.
Trollheim teleport 61 2 2 Asgarnia✓ Eadgar's Ruse is auto-unlocked in the Asgarnia Region, so this spell is immediately accessible.
Charge Fire Orb 63 30 3 1 Asgarnia✓ The Fire obelisk cannot be reached without unlocking the Asgarnia Region to access the Taverley Dungeon.
Ape Atoll Teleport 64 2 2 2 1 Kandarin✓ Monkey Madness II is auto-unlocked in the Kandarin Region, so this spell is immediately accessible.
Charge Air Orb 66 30 3 1 Wilderness✓ The Air Obelisk cannot be reached without unlocking the Asgarnia Region to access the Edgeville dungeon.
Kourend Castle Teleport 69 5 4 2 2 N/A Zeah is inaccessible.
Charge 80 3 3 3 Wilderness✓ A player must claim a god staff from the Chamber guardian in the Mage arena before being able to cast this spell
Wind Surge 81 7 1 Fremennik✓ Wrath runes are only obtainable after Dragon Slayer II is completed, which can only be auto-unlocked in the Fremennik Region. Wrath runes can then be obtained as PvM drops, as they can only be Runecrafted if the Kandarin Region is also unlocked.
Water Surge 85 7 10 1 Fremennik✓ Wrath runes are only obtainable after Dragon Slayer II is completed, which can only be auto-unlocked in the Fremennik Region. Wrath runes can then be obtained as PvM drops, as they can only be Runecrafted if the Kandarin Region is also unlocked.
Tele Block 85 1 1 1 Wilderness✓ Tele block can only be cast on other players in the Wilderness.
Teleport to Target 85 1 1 1 N/A Last man standing and Bounty hunter are disabled in the Trailblazer League.
Earth Surge 90 7 10 1 Fremennik✓ Wrath runes are only obtainable after Dragon Slayer II is completed, which can only be auto-unlocked in the Fremennik Region. Wrath runes can then be obtained as PvM drops, as they can only be Runecrafted if the Kandarin Region is also unlocked.
Lvl-7 Enchant 93 20 1 20 Kandarin✓ A Zenyte shard is only obtainable as a drop from Demonic gorillas in the Kandarin Region.
Fire Surge 95 7 10 1 Fremennik✓ Wrath runes are only obtainable after Dragon Slayer II is completed, which can only be auto-unlocked in the Fremennik Region. Wrath runes can then be obtained as PvM drops, as they can only be Runecrafted if the Kandarin Region is also unlocked.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Imbued heart Various Players can use the Invigorate option on the heart to temporarily increase their Magic level by 1 to 10 levels (1 + 10% of the player's level, rounded down). Only useable once every 7 minutes. Obtainable as a rare drop from superior slayer monsters.
Spicy stew (red spice) Desert✓ Boosts Magic by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Magic potion Desert✓
OR
Morytania✓		 Boosts Magic by 4. Requires level 76 Herblore. Secondary ingredient limitation, see Herblore guide.
Magic essence Misthalin✓ Boosts Magic by 3. Requires level 57 Herblore.
Wizard's mind bomb Asgarnia✓
OR
Fremennik✓		 Boosts Magic by 2-3. See shop locations.
Wizard's mind bomb(m) Morytania✓
AND
Fremennik✓		 Boosts Magic by 3-4. Requires the Morytania or Fremennik region to brew with level 34 Cooking, more easily produced by using the stuff from Trouble Brewing.
Oldak Asgarnia✓ Boosts Magic by ±2. Requires completion of Death to the Dorgeshuun.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Magic Cape Kandarin✓ Wizard Sinina Five permanent spellbook swaps per day. Useless without also unlocking the Lunar spellbook or the Ancient spellbook.

Obtainable as a rare drop from [[superior slayer monster]]s. |- | align=center | {{plinkp|Spicy stew}} || [[Spicy stew]] ([[red spice]]) || {{TB|Desert}} || Boosts [[Magic]] by ±0-5. {{TB|Morytania}}|| Boosts [[Magic]] by 4. Requires level 76 [[Herblore]].
